channel.title: How Do I Add Bandos General to my Client?
channel.description: I have a client. And I want to add the bandos general to my client. anyone know how or have a tut on how to? thanks!

item.title: How Do I Add Bandos General to my Client?
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

[quote=“LOLMFAO, post:3, topic:221207”]add this to class5.java

if(i == 3000) { // NPC ID, can be changed. aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default emotes and extra NPC info. Don't change this unless you know what you are doing. class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change. class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color class5.anIntArray94[0] = 5000; // Cape model ID class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5001; // Body peice 1 model ID class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 624; // NPC combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "An huge war chief.".getBytes(); // NPC description, you must leave the .getBytes() at the end or it will not work. }[/quote]

thanks exactly what i was looking for! =][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2008, 04:13:57 PM[/size][hr]but why is he walking all funny and stuff instead of walking normal? how do i fix it?!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Bandos General to my Client?

item.title: How Do I Add Bandos General to my Client?
item.dc:creator: @LOLMFAO LOLMFAO
item.description:
@LOLMFAO wrote:

add this to class5.java

if(i == 3000) { // NPC ID, can be changed. aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default emotes and extra NPC info. Don't change this unless you know what you are doing. class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change. class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors]; class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color class5.anIntArray94[0] = 5000; // Cape model ID class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5001; // Body peice 1 model ID class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 624; // NPC combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "An huge war chief.".getBytes(); // NPC description, you must leave the .getBytes() at the end or it will not work. }

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Add Bandos General to my Client?
